text: Mohamed Chakouri () (born May 21, 1986 in Arles, France) is an Algerian footballer who played as a defender for Charleroi S.C. in the Belgian First Division. ==International career== On August 17, 2010, Chakouri was called up to the Algerian National Team for a 2012 African Cup of Nations qualifier against Tanzania. ==References== ==External links== *worldsoccerstats.com * *Guardian Football Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Algerian footballers Category:French footballers Category:French people of Algerian descent Category:Montpellier HSC players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:R. title: Mohamed Chakouri
